title: Fix Chrome For Android
tags: chrome for android tips and tricks
description: I recently made a switch from Chrome to Firefox, So, in this video, well see 5 fixes to chrome.  Useful chrome flags   chrome://flags/#password-export [works on chrome 66] chrome://flags/#enable-chrome-home chrome://flags/#enable-accessibility-tab-switcher   You can reach me here  Website -  YouTube -  Facebook - Twitter -  Instagram -    What camera do I use?  Canon 70D  What mic do I use? Blue Yeti and Video Mic pro (depends on requirement)  What tripod do I use? Manfrotto MVKBFR  What video editor do I use? Final Cut Pro  What computer do I use? iMac 2015 for editing and a ThinkPad for casual work
